name: Breathe of The Fox
description:
Game contains loud sounds, so please make sure that loudness of your device is adjusted

Some evil aliens had abducted The Fox, so they can run their evil experiments and put probes into uncomfortable places. But there is a big problem -- there is no oxygen on the alien ship, so, even though The Fox managed to break free, it still has some challenges to face while running away from the ship catching the precious air with its lungs.

  • Can be played using arrow keys or WASD, [Space] to jump
  • The Fox can cling to walls, bounce and move while mid-air
  • Each move reduces amount of oxygen available. When its level reaches zero, The Fox dies and level restarts

Developed for Ludum Dare 44 by LiquorPone, in collaboration with Miles Seventh
